Message:
Throwing my arms
around her in the lab,
I felt myself calm down a little.

She flashes me a look of disgust,
but I know she doesn’t
really hate me.

Seeing her like that
only cheers me up more,
and I squeeze her even harder.

When I think of this possibly
being our last day together,
it makes me so sad that...

I only want to remove
the seed even more!

I’d crafted new theories,
implemented the tiniest of
improvements to my equipment,
and left my documents
in plain sight all for this.

But, despite my efforts,
I still have no proof that
any of this will work.
I’m sure of one thing, though.

If this works, I’ll be the happiest
I’ve ever been in my whole life!

That’s why...I no longer felt
any fear holding me back.

Upon seeing my return,
the teacher smiled before
activating the machine
attached to me.

After that, I felt something
inside me burst.
